FuncDef:
The if-match rd-filter command sets a filtering rule based on RD filters.
The undo if-match rd-filter command deletes a filtering rule based on RD filters. The if-match rd-filter command sets a filtering rule based on RD filters. The undo if-match rd-filter command deletes a filtering rule based on RD filters. By default, no filtering rule based on RD filters is set.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an RD filter.
The value is an integer in the range from 1 to 1024.

ExtraInfo: The if-match rd-filter command and the ip rd-filter command work together to filter routes based on RD attributes. For example:
